Player History
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 3/3/1988 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/26/1989 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/16/1989 with a Bruised Neck, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/24/1989 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 9/26/1989, off Rich Bordi (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 10/1/1989, off Steve Ontiveros (OAK)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1990, hitting .285 with 14 HR, 88 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 7/17/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/1991, hitting .367 with 2 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/1992, hitting .560 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
